title: In the previously activity we learned about generators. In this activity solve the problem on generators

questionText.text:
Write a generator, genPrimes, that returns the sequence of prime numbers on successive calls to its next() method: 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, ...

Hints:
Ideas about the problem
Have the generator keep a list of the primes it's generated. A candidate number x is prime if (x % p) != 0 for all earlier primes p.

Check your program against the give test cases below as a Zip file. Submit your Solution(Zip file) when all test cases are passed
